text: Neko Atsume: Kitty Collector is a cat collecting game for iOS and Android made by Hit-Point Co.,Ltd. It was released on October 20, 2014 and has been downloaded more than 19 million times."Android版 iOS版同時発売！ 【ねこあつめ】" [Simultaneous releases for Android and iOS! "Neko Atsume"]. Hit-Point (in Japanese). 20 October 2014. Retrieved 22 March 2018."ねこあつめ公式サイト" [Neko Atsume Official Website]. Hit-Point (in Japanese). Retrieved 22 March 2018. The game starts by purchasing foods, toys, and furniture to attract cats to the player's home. The player can watch cats playing with objects, take photos, and receive gifts of "niboshi" (にぼし, small dried sardines) and "mementos", which means treasure or prizes, from them. Right now, there are 62 cats for the player to collect. Inside these, 22 cats are "rare cats" and only appear when special items are in the player's home. ==References== Category:2014 video games Category:Android (operating system) games Category:Free-to-play video games Category:IOS games Category:Single-player video games Category:Video games about cats Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Virtual pet video games
title: Neko Atsume
